pages.title: Thunderstorms
pages.text: Storms are a powerful manifestation of Mother Nature.\Using the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$() you even started one when crafting $(l:general/onyx_shard)some powerful resources$().\\There is no doubt that you will find something here to help you on your journey.

pages.title: Storm Stones
pages.text: Dug into the ground by lightning strikes, you found these stones, vibrating in your hand due to barely-contained energy.\Used in the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$(), you can use them to summon thunderstorms with ease.\\_Because of their volatile nature, they do not react too nicely to explosions..._
